# Aseed Insight Documentation

## Getting started

- [Overview](/overview) - Navigate the Aseed docs and find the right guide for your task.
- [What is Aseed?](/what-is-aseed) - Understand how Aseed differs from general AI assistants for customer development research.
- [Workflow](/workflow) - Follow the full workflow from project setup to report sharing, including AI Interviewer preparation.
- [Quick Start: First Project](/quickstart) - Create a project, prepare AI interviews, add recordings, and generate a shareable report in minutes.

## Projects

- [Create a project](/projects/create) - Set up a project to organize interviews, context, and reports.
- [Add research context](/projects/context) - Add Research Goals and Interview Guide manually or with AI.
- [AI Interviewer](/projects/ai-interviewer) - Create interview links, run voice AI interviews, and store completed sessions as project records.
- [Edit project](/projects/edit) - Update project name, description, and status.
- [Manage projects](/projects/manage) - Organize projects using filters, search, and status management.
- [Upload records](/projects/upload-records) - Add interview files to a specific project.
- [Manage records](/projects/manage-records) - Rename, archive, delete, or remove records from a project.
- [Batch generation](/projects/batch-generation) - Generate reports for multiple records in one run.

## Records

- [Records page](/interviews/records) - View and manage all records in one table.
- [Upload records](/interviews/upload) - Upload audio, video, or text files as new records.
- [Upload text transcripts](/interviews/text-transcripts) - Import pre-written transcripts with parser selection.
- [Create interview guide](/interviews/guide-builder) - Generate structured interview guides with AI.
- [Transcribe records](/interviews/transcribe) - Configure language and speakers for transcription.
- [Edit transcripts](/interviews/edit) - Review and correct transcripts before report generation.

## Single Reports

- [Generate single reports](/reports/single) - Create per-interview reports (Transcript, Q&A, General, JTBD, Persona, Custom).
- [Edit and regenerate reports](/reports/edit) - Refine and regenerate report output after review.

## Report types

- [Overview](/reports/report-types) - Compare report types, structure, and use cases.
- [Transcript Report](/reports/report-types/transcript) - Transcript output used as the foundation for further analysis.
- [Q&A Report](/reports/report-types/qa) - Structured question-answer output with citations.
- [General Report](/reports/report-types/general) - Broad interview analysis with insights and recommendations.
- [JTBD Report](/reports/report-types/jtbd) - Jobs-to-be-Done analysis with job stories and opportunity framing.
- [Persona Report](/reports/report-types/persona) - Persona synthesis with motivations, pain points, and behavior patterns.
- [Custom Report](/reports/report-types/custom) - Prompt-based report tailored to your research needs.

## Project Reports

- [Create a project report](/reports/project) - Synthesize insights across multiple interviews.
- [Use report presets](/reports/presets) - Start from predefined project report structures.
- [Build a custom report](/reports/custom) - Build custom project report structures and prompts.

## Sharing

- [Share reports publicly](/sharing/public) - Create public report links for stakeholders without Aseed accounts.
- [Export reports](/sharing/export) - Export reports in DOCX or Markdown.

## Account & Billing

- [Account & Billing](/account/overview) - Manage token balance and billing settings.
- [Purchase tokens](/account/purchase) - Buy token packages.
- [Referral program](/account/referral) - Invite users and earn token rewards.
- [Token usage](/account/usage) - Understand how tokens are consumed and charged.

## API Reference

- [API Reference](/api-reference/introduction) - Public API reference for Aseed Insight.

## Changelog

- [Product updates](/changelog) - Latest releases and product improvements.
